name: CaptainTanks
description:
You are Capt. Tanks, the most highly decorated tank commander of the Atlantic Defence Force. 

During the routine road transfer of a Hypersonic Intercontinental Ballistic Missile terrorists from the Shadow Conglomerate attack! As the only tank commander in the area, you must protect the truck carrying the deadly missile and avert a disaster which could end the world as you know it!! 

  •  WASD to move
  •  Mouse to aim and fire 
  •  Run out of ammo? Pick up crates, or use your caterpillar tracks!
  •  Armoured Personnel Carriers can take more damage than soldiers

____

Created in 48 hours for the Miziziziz Game Jam.

My first game jam, and my first time using Godot. It started out as an homage to Blast Corps, and ended up as a nod to my childhood spent reading Usborne Code Your Own Adventure books and poking BASIC into an Amstrad CPC464

It's full of bugs, it might throw lots of errors, and the gameplay needs some serious balancing, but I had fun making it and I hope you enjoy playing it.
